topComments.author: Roger Watkins
topComments.comment: This place was fantastic! The people really care about these big cats. Tours last about an hour & are only $10. We will definitely go back again.

topComments.author: Zach Kortea
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este lugar √© incr√≠vel! Realmente gostei do passeio e nosso guia foi muito legal e muito perspicaz sobre todos os gatos e suas hist√≥rias de fundo. Tenha em mente que este √© um centro de resgate. Essas pessoas fazem um trabalho incr√≠vel salvando grandes felinos e dando a eles um lar melhor.  (Original) This place is amazing! Really enjoyed the tour and our guide was really nice and very insightful on all the cats and their back stories. Keep in mind this is a RESCUE center. These people do an amazing job saving big cats and giving them a better home.

topComments.author: Margaret Hiscock
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Em um passeio de meia hora, aprendemos sobre muitos dos animais que eles cuidam, como eles chegaram ao centro de resgate e vimos suas personalidades √∫nicas. √â claro que a equipe ama e cuida dos animais. N√≥s visitamos no final do dia, quando os animais j√° estavam alimentados, ent√£o eles estavam com sono. A melhor hora para visitar √© um dia nublado por volta das 10h.  (Original) In a half-hour tour, we learned about many of the animals they care for, how they came to be at the rescue center, and saw their unique personalities. It's clear that the staff love and care for the animals. We visited late in the day, when the animals had already been fed, so they were sleepy. The best time to visit is a cloudy day around 10 am.

topComments.author: Joseph Tempio
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √ìtimo lugar para ver grandes gatos de perto.  Fa√ßa uma reserva com anteced√™ncia, pois eles levam pequenos grupos em seus passeios.  Uma visita guiada pelo terreno com todas as informa√ß√µes dispon√≠veis sobre cada felino.  Eles resgatam todos os tipos de felinos de todos os lados e muitos dos grandes felinos est√£o gritando durante o passeio.  Voc√™ est√° caminhando por caminhos e grama etc, ent√£o use sapatos ou t√™nis.  Definitivamente voltaria novamente.  (Original) Great place to go to see big Cats up close.  Make a reservation ahead of time since they take small groups on their tours.  A guided tour through the grounds with any available information on each Feline.  They rescue all types of felines from all over and many of the big cats are hollering at time during the tour.  You are walking through paths & grass etc  so wear shoes or sneakers.  Will definitely go again.

topComments.author: Elaine Schaler
topComments.comment: This is an amazing place to visit.  Visited here 10 years ago and then the other day.  Lots of updates and remodeling.  Tour guide was so knowledgeable,  gave so much information about big cats.  Those big cats look like they are living much better lives then where they all came from.  Highly recommend!!

Provavelmente retornar√° no outono em um dia um pouco t√£o quente e talvez veja mais a√ß√£o.  (Original) Recently found out about this place. I enjoyed being so close to all of the animals. Unlike the zoo, these big cats were mostly active walking around and making noises. Tour guide was friendly and informed on all the animals we saw. Will probably return in the fall in a bit so hot day and maybe see more action.

topComments.author: Denise Linkous
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Teve um tempo maravilhoso. Guias contaram hist√≥rias para cada le√£o e outros animais  (Original) Had a wonderful time. Guides told back story to every lion and other animals

topComments.author: P. Renee Gholson
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √â um pouco assustador chegar t√£o perto de grandes felinos, mas √© absolutamente emocionante. Eles s√£o lindos, bem cuidados e parecem cercados com seguran√ßa. Use sapatos de caminhada, pois o passeio leva voc√™ por uma trilha. H√° um porta-john na √°rea de check-in e um pequeno barraco onde o funcion√°rio recolhe dinheiro e vende saqu√™s como √≠m√£s, camisetas, etc. Voc√™ pode obter uma pequena quantidade de sombra na varanda ou de uma √°rvore pr√≥xima. Em outras palavras, esteja preparado para desfrutar de uma atividade totalmente ao ar livre. √â maravilhoso.  (Original) It's a bit scary to get that close to big cats, but it's absolutely thrilling.  They're beautiful, well taken care of and seem safely fenced. Wear hiking shoes, as the tour takes you on a trail. There's a porta-john at the check-in area and a small shack where the employee collects money and sells keep sakes like magnets, t-shirts, etc. You can get a small amount of shade on it's porch or from a nearby tree. In other words, be prepared to enjoy a fully outdoor activity. It's wonderful.

Hist√≥rias de partir o cora√ß√£o sobre a vida dos animais, mas t√£o felizes em v√™-los prosperar em seus lares para sempre. Vai voltar novamente. Este lugar √© √≥timo!  (Original) Very friendly staff. The tour guide answered all our questions. Heart breaking stories about the animals lives but so happy to see them thrive in their forever homes. Will go back again. This place is great!

topComments.author: jennifer peachee
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) De perto e pessoal com os belos gatos GRANDES. Nosso guia tur√≠stico era muito experiente e conduziu um √≥timo passeio. (Original) Up close and personal with the beautiful BIG cats.  Our tour guide was very knowledgeable and led a great tour.  The cats were interactive in our 10 am session.  They all looked so happy and healthy.  Great stop for the family.  Smaller facility...but big on the number of cats and room.

topComments.author: Jennifer R
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Eu inicialmente julguei este lugar pela capa - vindo de um ambiente suburbano, eu tinha certeza que √≠amos morrer aqui üòÜ Mas quando conhecemos as pessoas, definitivamente relaxamos. Esta foi uma das experi√™ncias mais memor√°veis ‚Äã‚Äãque j√° tivemos em uma viagem. Nosso guia tur√≠stico era uma mulher mais velha que conhecia a hist√≥ria de cada gato e todos os gatos a amavam absolutamente. N√≥s nos aproximamos de muitos deles e foi incrivelmente m√°gico. Assim que cheguei em casa, mudei meu Amazon Smile para apoi√°-los. Voltaremos aqui algum dia.  (Original) I initially judged this place by its cover - coming from a suburban environment, I was pretty sure we were going to die out here üòÜ But when we met the people, we definitely relaxed. This was one of the most memorable experiences we've ever had on a road trip. Our tour guide was an older woman who knew every single cat's story and all the cats absolutely loved her. We got up close and personal with many of them and it was just unbelievably magical. As soon as I got home, I changed my Amazon Smile to support them. We'll be coming back down here someday.

topComments.author: Phil Miller

Eles fazem passeios para que todos estejam seguros.  (Original) This is a great family visit.    A variety of big cats and you are up close and personal in a true forest background.   They do tours so everyone is safe.

topComments.author: Anita Huizenga
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Foi incr√≠vel ver todos os animais! Tivemos um √≥timo guia de turismo!  (Original) It was awesome to see all of the animals! We had a great tour guide!

topComments.author: John Kurton
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Um lugar fant√°stico para chegar perto de alguns felinos incr√≠veis. O passeio durou cerca de uma hora e pudemos ver cerca de 50 animais.  (Original) A Fantastic place to get up close to some amazing big cats.The tour lasted about an hour and we got to see around 50 animals.

topComments.author: Erica Fabulous
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este lugar √© verdadeiramente uma j√≥ia escondida em Indiana. Eu pedi a um dos volunt√°rios que entrasse no meu trabalho vestindo a camisa e distribuindo panfletos e mostrando fotos de todos os animais. Ele parecia amar tanto que eu tive que ir naquele dia. Depois de ver por mim mesmo √© realmente um de um tipo incr√≠vel lugar para se visitar. Ser capaz de se aproximar desses animais √© uma experi√™ncia que poucos ir√£o experimentar. Eles s√£o muito bem informados sobre todos os animais que voc√™ pode e n√£o pode ver e todos os trabalhos parecem desfrutar dos seus rolos que ajudam no EFRC. Eu definitivamente recomendo parar por um passeio e ver todos os animais incr√≠veis.  (Original) This place is truly a hidden gem in Indiana. I had one of the volunteers come into my work wearing the shirt and handing out fliers and showing off pictures of all the animals.  He seemed to love it so much I had to go that day.  After seeing it for myself it really is a one of a kind amazing place to visit.  Being able to get within feet of these animals is an experience few will ever get to experience.  They are very knowledgeable about all the animals you can and can't see and all of the works seem to enjoy their rolls they help with at the EFRC. I definitely recommend stopping by for a tour and seeing all the incredible animals.

Mais barato do que qualquer zool√≥gico que voc√™ vai para ir tamb√©m. US $ 10 para adultos e US $ 5 para crian√ßas. Cool pequena loja de presentes tamb√©m. N√£o posso recomendar este lugar o suficiente.  (Original) Awesome place! Educating the public while preserving and rescuing big cat breeds. Knowledgeable tour guides, lots of cats and fun all around. Cheaper than any zoo you'll ever go to as well. $10 for adults and $5 for children. Cool little gift shop as well. Can't recommend this place enough.
